description:
Beelzebub is rescued from the sea and pulled ashore by a ... Devil Cheeseburger?! Beelzebub and the Devil Cheeseburger grow to become good pals on the deserted island; however, as Beelzebub`s hunger grows his rescuer`s safety is put in jeopardy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ta ga Tame ni Hara wa Naru
